column1: Annie and her baby-brother went to ride with their papa and mamma. They crossed the river on a long bridge; and beyond it they saw horses and cows feeding on the green prairie."What are all these heaps of dirt for?" said Annie."We are just entering 'dog-town
column2: '" said her papa; "and those are the houses of the inhabitants. Do you see the two little fellows sitting up on that mound?""Yes
column3: said Annie; but they look like little fat squirrels; don't they
